meanings.definition: Any of a class of nitrogenous organic compounds that consist of large molecules composed of one or more long chains of amino acids and are an essential part of all living organisms.
meanings.sent1: My body needs protein to stay healthy and strong.
meanings.sent2: Chicken and fish are good sources of protein.
meanings.sent3: Why did the cell refuse to share its protein? It was too selfish!
meanings.sent4: Her love for protein was like a fuel that kept her going.
meanings.sent5: The protein in plants helps them grow and thrive.

meanings.definition: A substance that has a high protein content, such as meat, eggs, or nuts.
meanings.sent1: I always make sure to include protein in my meals for energy.
meanings.sent2: Almonds are a great snack choice for a protein boost.
meanings.sent3: The peanut butter was so full of protein, it flexed its lid off!
meanings.sent4: His muscles were like sponges soaking up the protein after a workout.
meanings.sent5: The protein in the eggs helped build muscle mass.
